item.title: Bhikkhu Subhuti’s Blog has moved!
item.description: Bhikkhu Subhuti’s Blog has moved! [caption id=“attachment_1406” align=“alignnone” width=“593”] cc-sa-3.0[/caption] The blog at https://Subhuti.withmettanet has moved to https://AmericanMonk.org The new title of the blog is American Monk: Bhante Subhūti Why change The Domain Address? The reason why I changed the name of the domain was to streamline my verbal website announcements to let them known how to find the monk in Kauai. Usually a conversation will start up with some new person in Kauai and then I say, “Hey, you can check out my blog at subhuti.
